description:
No one likes soggy feet. These socks have a 3-layer design, like a waterproof jacket, to keep your feet dry without getting clammy or overheating.

  • Wear-resistant knit outer with Artex waterproof-breathable membrane
  • Moisture-wicking Coolmax FX inner fibres have an anti-odour treatment
  • Heel-to-toe padding cushions underfoot
  • Wearable in close fitting cycling or running shoes
  • As of 2020 Showers Pass is Climate Neutral certified, meaning they fully offset their carbon emissions. Climate Neutral certified is a consumer label that's carried by brands who take responsibility for greenhouse gas emissions generated in production, operation and shipping of their goods and services
name: Showers Pass Lightweight Waterproof Socks - Unisex
